text:
English help someone?
I have this sentence:
```...
we disable this feedback by substituting the radiative cooling rate by its horizontally averaged value 
...```
and I don’t like how it reads due to repeating `by`. How can it improve? Is it valid to get rid of the first `by`?
```...
we disable this feedback substituting the radiative cooling rate by its horizontally averaged value 
...```

elements.text:
English help someone?
I have this sentence:

...
we disable this feedback by substituting the radiative cooling rate by its horizontally averaged value 
...
and I don’t like how it reads due to repeating
. How can it improve? Is it valid to get rid of the first

...
we disable this feedback substituting the radiative cooling rate by its horizontally averaged value 
...

text: "to reduce this feedback, we average the radiative cooling rate horizontally" is probably how I would put it

elements.text: "to reduce this feedback, we average the radiative cooling rate horizontally" is probably how I would put it
